SELECT h.house_id,h.house_title,aa.code_state as house_urban,bb.code_state as house_street,h.house_district,house_rent,cc.code_state as house_state,h.house_area,h.house_floor, dd.code_state as house_orintation,h.house_date,ee.code_state as house_layout,h.house_staffid,ff.code_state as house_audit,h.house_cover,gg.code_state as la_id,staff.*,user.id,user.u_name,user.u_phone from (SELECT * from house
and house_state = #{house_state}
and house_district like "%"#{house_district}"%"
and house_delete=1
limit #{start},#{pageSize}) h join code aa on h.house_urban=aa.code_number join code bb on h.house_street=bb.code_number join code cc on h.house_state=cc.code_number join code dd on h.house_orientation=dd.code_number join code ee on h.house_layout=ee.code_number join code ff on h.house_audit=ff.code_number join house_lable hla on h.house_id=hla.ho_id join code gg on hla.la_id=gg.code_number join staff on h.house_staffid=staff_num join user user on h.house_uid=user.id where cc.code_type=8 and dd.code_type=6 and ee.code_type=7 and ff.code_type=5 and gg.code_type=9
